name: Thristr the Green
response: Thristr the Green is a troll who’s more likely to tend to a wind farm than terrorize villagers. When it’s not daydreaming about endless forests and dancing towers, it’s probably shrugging off challenges with a nonchalant scratch behind its ear. Insurance? That’s all that’s needed—why bother with drama when coverage exists? Pharma? Worship is in order, but don’t expect any sonnets from this mossy poet. Crypto? Well, smashing it isn’t worth the effort, so it’ll tolerate it… for now. Thristr the Green is the troll who proves even mythical creatures can have environmentally friendly quirks and a shrug-filled personality.
